dublin_core.dcvalue: RJ Simonds MD Vice President Program Innovation and Policy at Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation EGPAF gave this welcome presentation at the August 15 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group which EGPAF hosted The meeting covered PMTCT activities and projects using mHealth This introduction describes the overall work of EGPAF globally
Introduction to Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation (EGPAF)
